column1: '''Victoria Beynon-Cole''' is a New Zealand extras casting coordinator and actress who portrayed as [[Orcs]] in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' and ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
column2: The Two Towers]]'' and worked as an extras casting coordinator and director for ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]'' and ''[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey]]''.{{Fact}}
